content: ***hestia the hedgehog no-sew amigurumi crochet pattern*** ✦ sweet hestia the no-sew hedgehog pattern ✦ this amigurumi uses simple stitches and no sewing ✦ makes an amazing gift for lovers of woodland creatures ✦ make your hedgehog traditional or with a fun color ✦ this sweet hedgehog is the perfect size for little hands to hold ✦ learn to create a magic_ring with included link to video tutorial --> ready for immediate download in pdf form --> this is an easy crochet pattern appropriate for the confident advanced beginner with no sewing and lots of photo tutorials click here to join my vip facebook community for exclusive discounts cals giveaways and more --> **join the fb group ** 1 **what is included ** 8 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms your pattern is available to download from your ravelry purchases and an email will be sent with a download link as well **size ** 5 tall x 9 - 10 around **materials ** worsted weight yarn 70-100 yds total 30-40 yds head/belly 50-60 yds back spines 5 yds nose e/4 3 5 mm hook or f/5 3 75 mm hook stitch markers 1 oz stuffing of choice safety eyes or felt eyes of choice i used 12 mm safety eyes yarn needle scissors **stitch key ** slip_stitch -
